name: Video Connect – Record Video with Form, Featured Video, Floating Video
author: dna88

sections.description:
Record Videos with contact form 7 form submissions. Featured Product videos for Woocommerce, Video widgets and more! Use videos to explain your products or services and connect with your users. Allow users to record videos and email you with Contact Form 7. All in one Video solution for WordPress.

Support, Bug Report, Feature Requests | Video Connect Pro Demo | Upgrade to Video Connect Pro!

Video Connect has 4 Major Features to Improve your Website

Video Recorder with Contact Form 7

Video Connect is also an addon for Contact Form 7. This plugin adds a Video recorder field to your CF7 forms. Your site users can record a Video message that is saved in the WordPress backend and you can watch that any time. Video recording links are emailed with the CF7 form submissions and available in the backend.

Compatible with all Modern Browsers and it sports a Beautiful modern User Interface.

** Video connect requires SSL to work for Contact Form 7 integration

Greet Users with Floating Video Bubble

Place a floating video bubble on every page of your website to increase trust. A personal video introduction can significantly increase your conversions and sales because people trust people more than Text!

Video Widgets to Explain Your Products or Services

Use Video widgets to speak to your your website users. A good copywriting is not always sufficient. Now you can simply explain to your customers about your products and services using your own video to generate trust and increase conversion rates. Show the video widget button anywhere on your page with shortcode. When it is clicked, the video will play on the bottom right corner. Youtube videos are supported. Both landscape and portrait mode are supported.

Video Widgets work on any page where you can place a shortcode.

Featured Video for WooCommerce Products

A product featured video plugin for WooCommerce that allows your customers to see a YouTube or Daily Motion video (Vimeo and self hosted videos supported in the pro version) instead of the featured image on the product single page.

Add the URL of a YouTube or Daily Motion video in the specific field on the woocommerce product edit page and your customers will be able to watch something dynamic and customized instead of a static image. This is a great way to increase your sales. Easy to use Featured Product video for your Woocommerce.

Upgrade to Video Connect Pro!

Greet Users with Floating Video Bubble

  • Supports Youtube and Self Hosted Uploaded Videos
  • Create unlimited floating video bubbles for different pages
  • Set Different Videos for Different Pages
  • Advanced Page control options
  • Customize Colors of buttons and bubble border
  • Fine tune the floating video bubble position
  • Set Floating Video Bubble Width and Height
  • Use Image or Video for Floating Icon
  • Works on All Devices and Borwsers

Video Widgets Anywhere to Explain Your Products or Services
* Use Video widgets to increase your conversions and sales
* Supports Youtube videos and Self Hosted Videos
* Supports four different templates for Buttons
* Call to Action button with video widget with button link
* Customize Colors
* Select Portrait mode or Landscape mode
* Create unlimited number of video widgets

Featured Video for WooCommerce Products

  • Display Videos on the product single page and the Shop Page
  • Support Self Hosted (Uploaded) videos and Vimeo
  • Option to Open and play Videos in a lightbox pop up on shop page
  • Option for Video Loop

Video Upload with Contact Form 7
* Allow your site users to upload a video with their form submission
* Video Records saved in the backend
* Play and Download Video Option in the WordPress Dashboard
* Integration with more forms coming soon

Support, Bug Report, Feature Requests | Video Connect Pro Demo | Upgrade to Video Connect Pro!

Check out our other helpful plugins

Voice Widgets Free, Pro – Use Voice widgets to speak to your your website users and Get voice messages with your forms and woocommerce

Highlight Free, Pro – Use various highlight options to draw user attentions to particular text paragraphs. Highlight Pro version supports Speed Reading or Bionic reading

Video Connect Free, Pro – Featured video for Woocommerce products, Video widget, Videos with contact form 7 and more

Video Connect Support, Bug Fix, Feature Request

  • We welcome your feedback and new feature requests for this chat bot! This is a new plugin and we want to improve this video connect plugin’s features based on your feedback and suggestions. *

Let us know if you face any problem or need help with this chatbot from the comments section.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin zip file. Extract and upload in your wp-content/plugins folder.
  2. From the wp-admin panel go to plugins and activate “Video Connect”
  3. You are done.
sections.faq:
How to use Video Connect form field

Please check the plugin’s Help section. More details coming soon.
